text: Uri Shraga Orbach, Hebrew: אורי שרגא אורבך , (28 March 1960 – 16 February 2015) was an Israeli Religious Zionist writer, journalist and politician. He served as a Member of Knesset for The Jewish Home party and as Pensioner Affairs Minister. Orbach was born in Petah Tikva and died of blood disease in Jerusalem, aged 54.Ex-Jewish Home minister Uri Orbach dies at 54, Times of Israel, February 16, 2015Bayit Yehudi minister Uri Orbach dies at 54, Ynetnews, February 2016 ==References== == Other websites == * Bio at the Knesset Website Category:1960 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Children's writers Category:Deaths from blood disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Israel Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Government ministers of Israel Category:Israeli journalists Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Israeli Jewish religious writers Category:People from Petah Tikva
title: Uri Orbach
